root.message: The DATA_COMP field for indicator 7-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: Number of households with access to electricity divided to total number households and multiplies the results by 100
ចំនួនគ្រួសារដែលមានអគ្គិសនីប្រើប្រាស់ចែកជាចំនួនគ្រួសារសរុបនិងគុណនឹងលទ្ធផល ១០០ [១១៩]
